DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , immunogenicity , tolerability H5N1 Vaccine healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Of A Recombinant H5N1 Vaccine In Adults
DOC.criteria: Subjects accept study must meet follow inclusion criterion : Male female age 18 49 year inclusive Able give write informed consent participate Healthy determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , clinical safety laboratory examination baseline Females fulfill one follow criterion : 1 . At least 1 year postmenopausal 2 . Surgically sterile 3 . Will use oral , implantable , transdermal , injectable contraceptive 30 day prior first vaccination 28 day vaccination 4 .
